ValidationRule.description: Force users to populate the Abated/Reduced How? field, when specific Closure Code values are chosen.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), (ISPICKVAL(Abated_Reduced_How__c, '')), ( ( ISPICKVAL(Closure_Code__c, 'Abated - Pending Additional Notice') ) || ( ISPICKVAL(Closure_Code__c, ' Abated Partially - Field/Client Responsible for Remaining Issue') ) || ( ISPICKVAL(Closure_Code__c, 'Assisted Client - Abated/Reduced') ) || ( ISPICKVAL(Closure_Code__c, 'Reduced - Pending Additional Notice') ) || ( ISPICKVAL(Closure_Code__c, 'Reduced Partially - Field/Client Responsible for Remaining Issue') ) ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select an Abated/Reduced How? value when choosing an "Abated" or "Reduced" Closure Code value.
